/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their modern architecture reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The perspective of the image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique charm to the urban landscape.
